title: Remember that time 2 of the top 3 Korean teams didn't make it to the finals of IEM Katowice?
body:
I remember.

Excuses, post them, now.

replies.body: Iem is just going wild. SK lose to yoe, CJ lose to TSM, CJ lose to WE, GE lose to WE, I mean who could've possibly guessed all of this would happen.

Certainly not I. I had GMB > TSM and C9 > SK  all hope was dashed when I saw Game 1 of IEM...That c9 game was Horrible. Completely horrible...If this was LCS, C9 would have just lost to CST for relegations

> [{quoted}](name=Vixanys,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=RnieJJkF,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-14T22:25:36.454+0000)
>
> Certainly not I. I had GMB > TSM and C9 > SK  all hope was dashed when I saw Game 1 of IEM...That c9 game was Horrible. Completely horrible...If this was LCS, C9 would have just lost to CST for relegations

> Oh man C9 just didn't live up to expectations. I mean I'll give props to YOE for their win, but C9 really threw that game hard. I didn't see their game vs ge, but the way alphadraft was blowing up about towerdives, I assumed it was very awful.
I thought Gambit would win. lol

> [{quoted}](name=The Blue Rooster,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=RnieJJkF,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-14T20:55:56.973+0000)
>
> I thought Gambit would win. lol

i thought they'd win at least one
